Planet

Planets in the Creation of Marlien are a rare type of astronomical body, comparable to planets in Totum.

The orbital patterns of planets in Marlien vary greatly, with some locked into orbits with Spires, others with stars, and others in more complex arrangements.

Because a planet must meet the same criterion as in Totum in order to qualify as such, a body close enough to a Spire or to the floor of [creation:Marlien]] to share their atmosphere is never considered a planet, as it has not cleared its neighbouring region; instead, it is likely a moon.

List of Planets

  • Thexingja
